comments:
Could not reproduce with latest. Are you sure your JRE container is properly initialized ?
What are your compiler settings?

Strange, today I also cannot reproduce the strange behaviour. Neither a fresh Eclipse installation nor my usual installation (that shows the [reproducable] behaviour yesterday) produce any compile time error when creating the test case.

The only evidence for the problems is the Eclipse log file, taht contains the following entry for yesterday (but I'm not quite sure if it is exactly the time, the strange behaviour occurs).

The NullPointerException looks like bug 96984. I just reopened it. 

However it is unrelated to the original problem. So we still need steps to reproduce the original problem.
Please reopen if you have steps to reproduce.
